T02D1219:13b-9: tsanda l'i dang lhan cig tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1219:13b-10: med na ting nge 'dzin gyis bya'o //
T02D1219:13b-11: de nas bla ma yang lag drug dang ldan pas
T02D1219:13b-12: lha'i 'khor lo rdzogs par tshul bzhin du bskyed la
T02D1219:13b-13: / de nas goo r'i la bka' bsgo la lha rnams spyan drang ngo //
T02D1219:13b-14: spyan drangs pa de la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul lo //
T02D1219:13b-15: de nas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba
T02D1219:13b-16: dang dgyes pa bskyed pa rnams byas la gnyis su
T02D1219:13b-18: de la mchod pa rnams dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1219:13b-24: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D1219:13b-25: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod la /
T02D1219:13b-27: gur kum char du dbab pa dang /
T02D1219:13b-28: sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod do ;
T02D1219:13b-29: / de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pas kyang rim pa bzhin du mchod la /
T02D1219:13b-30: de nas bstod pa nyi shu pas lha rnams la bstod par bya'o //
T02D1219:13b-32: bkra shis kyi glu'i khyad par gyis kyang mchod do /
T02D1219:13b-33: tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor nas /
T02D1219:13b-34: smon lam gyi tshig brjod la bskor ba lan gsum bya ste /
T02D1219:13b-35: gtor ma dgu yang dbul lo //
T02D1219:13b-36: de nas dbang bskur ba la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1219:13b-37: slob ma 'jug pa'i rim pa bzhin du /
T02D1219:13b-38: slob dpon rang nyid dang po la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1219:13b-39: de nas sngon du brtags pa'i slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pas 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1219:13b-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02D1219:13b-41: slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D1219:13b-42: gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yi //
T02D1219:13b-43: lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1219:13b-44: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1219:13b-45: mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1219:13b-46: zhes slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1219:14a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1219:14a-3: he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog //
T02D1219:14a-5: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02D1219:14a-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal ba bya ste /
T02D1219:14a-7: aom na ma: te h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1219:14a-8: aom na ma:mi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1219:14a-9: aom na mo na ma:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1219:14a-11: de nas sdom pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1219:14a-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1219:14a-13: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02D1219:14a-15: sdom pa brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D1219:14a-16: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni //
T02D1219:14a-17: slob ma khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02D1219:14a-18: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02D1219:14a-19: shes rab dril bu zhes su gsungs //
T02D1219:14a-20: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1219:14a-21: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02D1219:14a-22: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02D1219:14a-23: dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad //
T02D1219:14a-24: rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni //
T02D1219:14a-25: nyin re bzhin yang lan drug tu //
T02D1219:14a-26: chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams //
T02D1219:14a-27: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D1219:14a-28: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D1219:14a-29: dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung //
T02D1219:14a-32: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D1219:14a-33: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D1219:14a-34: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1219:14a-35: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D1219:14a-38: // / ding khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi nang du zhugs kyis /
T02D1219:14a-39: ngas khyed la dpal he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1219:14a-40: ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1219:14a-41: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02D1219:14a-42: dngos grub gzhan dag lta ci smos kyi /
T02D1219:14a-43: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste /
T02D1219:14a-44: dam tshig nyams par gyur te re //
T02D1219:14a-45: he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi //
T02D1219:14a-46: snying la yang dag zhugs pa ni //
T02D1219:14a-47: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1219:14a-48: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D1219:14a-49: de nas ka p'a la'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pas dam tshig gi chu blud de /
T02D1219:14a-50: kye rdo rje dang ldan pa'i gzi mdangs dang ldan pas 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1219:14a-51: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1219:14b-0: @14b dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1219:14b-1: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste //
T02D1219:14b-3: aom sarba panytsa aa mri to da ka tha:tha:tha:h'u%/
T02D1219:14b-4: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga nyid yin gyis /
T02D1219:14b-5: ngas gang 'di byos shig ces bsgo bde khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D1219:14b-6: khyod kyis nga brnyas pa'i las ma byed cig /
T02D1219:14b-7: byas na khyod yid mi bde ba ma spangs par
T02D1219:14b-8: tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta
T02D1219:14b-9: re / de nas dpa' bo dang /
T02D1219:14b-10: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs la /
T02D1219:14b-11: dpal he ru ka bdag la dbab par mdzod cig ces brjod du gzhug cing /
T02D1219:14b-12: slob ma la bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga blud de /
T02D1219:14b-13: bla ma 'gying bag dang bcas pas go cha bgos
T02D1219:14b-14: pa rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs
T02D1219:14b-15: ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas gtso bo dang rnal
T02D1219:14b-16: 'byor mar bcas pa rnams bkug nas /
T02D1219:14b-17: slob ma'i snying gar gzhug ste /
T02D1219:14b-18: bcug pas smra nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D1219:14b-19: las rnam bzhi'i kha dog gang dang gang mthong ba de dang mthun par de la bstan to //
T02D1219:14b-20: de nas me tog gi phreng ba thogs la /
T02D1219:14b-22: zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor du gtor la /
T02D1219:14b-23: de nas slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1219:14b-24: de nas slob ma'i lag pa nas gzung la mig dbye bar bya ste /
T02D1219:14b-25: he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi //
T02D1219:14b-26: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02D1219:14b-27: phye bas thams cad mthong bar byed //
T02D1219:14b-28: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D1219:14b-30: aa ba ha ra pa ta lam hri:/
T02D1219:14b-32: gdong g-yogs phud la 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02D1219:14b-34: da ni dad pa rab tu skyed //
T02D1219:14b-35: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes //
T02D1219:14b-36: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1219:14b-37: 'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang //
T02D1219:14b-38: dngos grub kun khyod mngon du 'gyur //
T02D1219:14b-39: dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang //
T02D1219:14b-40: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02D1219:14b-42: me tog gang du lhung ba'i lha ngo bstan cing /
T02D1219:14b-44: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dgod pa'i skabs kyi
T02D1219:14b-45: phyag mtshan gyi kha dog las shes par byas la
T02D1219:14b-46: bstan cing / phyag mtshan yang tshul bzhin du bstan to //
T02D1219:15a-1: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D1219:15a-3: // / de las gzhal yas khang gru bzhir byung ba
T02D1219:15a-4: ni tshad med pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang
T02D1219:15a-5: bzhin no // sgo bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-6: rta babs bzhi ni yang dag par spong pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-7: dra ba phyed pa ni nyon mongs pa chen po rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1219:15a-8: dra ba ni nyon mongs chung ngu rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1219:15a-9: ka ba brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1219:15a-10: rin po che'i pha gu la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1219:15a-11: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams ni //
T02D1219:15a-12: gzugs sgra la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1219:15a-13: rdo rje ra ba ni zab mo'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags so //
T02D1219:15a-14: me 'od ni phyin ci log gi bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs pa'i rtags so //
T02D1219:15a-15: bum pa brgyad ni che ba'i yon tan gyis rgyas
T02D1219:15a-16: shing thugs rje chen po'i ros yongs su gang ba'i
T02D1219:15a-17: rtags so // de ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do /
T02D1219:15a-19: // / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje ni rnam par
T02D1219:15a-20: shes pa'i phung po dang zhe sdang rnam par dag
T02D1219:15a-22: goo r'i ni zhe sdang dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-23: chom rkun ma ni gti mug dang /
T02D1219:15a-24: sgra rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-25: ro langs ma ni nga rgyal dang dri rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-26: ghasma r'i ni 'dod chags dang ro rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-27: pukka s'i ni zhe sdang dang sa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-28: ri khrod ma ni gti mug dang chu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-29: gtum mo ni nga rgyal dang me rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-30: g-yung mo ni 'dod chags dang rlung rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1219:15a-31: bdag med rnal 'byor ma ni yab dang mthun no //
T02D1219:15a-32: de ni lha'i de kho na nyid do /
T02D1219:15a-34: // / de nas slob mas bla ma'i zhabs la dad pas phyag btsal la /
T02D1219:15a-35: yon gyi mchog rnams thogs te bla ma la phul
T02D1219:15a-36: nas dbang nod pa'i don du bla ma la gsol
T02D1219:15a-38: he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba //
T02D1219:15a-39: 'gro ba bskyab phyir gzi brjid can //
T02D1219:15a-40: de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas so //
T02D1219:15b-0: @15b de bzhin bdag la de stsol cig //
T02D1219:15b-1: dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i //
T02D1219:15b-2: dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1219:15b-3: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1219:15b-4: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid //
T02D1219:15b-5: ces slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1219:15b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i shar sgo'i lho
T02D1219:15b-7: phyogs su padma 'dab ma brgyad bris pa'i steng du
T02D1219:15b-8: seng ge'i khri bshams la de'i steng du sna tshogs
T02D1219:15b-9: padma'i gdan bting ba la gnyis su med pa'i blo
T02D1219:15b-11: bla ma la gus shing gtong sems che ba de gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1219:15b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la 'bad de ci nus pas mchod nas /
T02D1219:15b-13: slob ma'i steng du gdugs dkar po bzung la /
T02D1219:15b-14: me tog phreng ba dang chu la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1219:15b-15: de yang dang po yungs kar dang bdud rtsi rnam
T02D1219:15b-16: pa lnga'i chus bdag nyid gzi brjid dang bcas pas
T02D1219:15b-18: dbang bskur ba'i bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bskrad bar byas la /
T02D1219:15b-19: ra ba dang dra ba dang gur la sogs pa yang bya'o //
T02D1219:15b-20: de nas slob ma khrus byas la /
T02D1219:15b-21: gos bzang po bskon nas khri la bzhag ste snyim pa me tog gis bkang la /
T02D1219:15b-22: dkyil 'khor du 'thor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1219:15b-23: sngags ni aom pra t'itstsha badzra ho zhes brjod la gtor ro //
T02D1219:15b-24: de nas me tog lhung ba blangs te slob ma'i mgo la bcings la /
T02D1219:15b-25: aom dharm'a kunda aa bhi shi nytsa zhes brjod do //
T02D1219:15b-26: de nas padma'i lag pa gnyis kyis sngags pas bum pa rnams bteg nas /
T02D1219:15b-27: slob ma'i mgo la gtugs te /
T02D1219:15b-28: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa mi tram zhes brjod /
T02D1219:15b-29: sngags brjod la dbang bskur ro //
T02D1219:15b-30: de nas rnam par rgyal pa'i bum ba bteg la /
T02D1219:15b-31: dril bu'i sgra dkrol te glu'i rnam pa blang zhing chu'i dbang bskur te sngags gong ma brjod do //
T02D1219:15b-32: de ltar chu'i dbang bskur bas rnam par rtog pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad dag par bsam mo //
T02D1219:15b-33: gser la sogs pa las brdungs pa'am /
T02D1219:15b-34: ba so las 'bur du brkos pa'am /
T02D1219:15b-35: ras la sogs pa la ri mor bris pa'am /
T02D1219:15b-36: gos kyi rnam pa la sogs pa gang yang rung
T02D1219:15b-37: ba la de nyid du mi dmigs par byas pa
T02D1219:15b-38: las / aom las rin chen 'byung ldan bsams te /
T02D1219:15b-39: de la ye shes sems dpa'i dgug pa dang /
T02D1219:16a-2: de la mchod pa phul te /
T02D1219:16a-3: bzlas pa nus tshad byas la /
T02D1219:16a-4: de nas bstod pa byas nas /
T02D1219:16a-5: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa /
T02D1219:16a-6: zhes sogs pa'i tshig brjod do //
T02D1219:16a-7: de ltar gzhan la yang bskyed pa dang /
T02D1219:16a-12: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag ces pa'i tshig brjod pa dang /
T02D1219:16a-13: kun tshig des 'dra ste kun la bya'o //
T02D1219:16a-14: de nas cod pan gyi gzugs su gyur pa /
T02D1219:16a-15: dar dpyang gnyis thogs la 'di skad brjod de sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1219:16a-16: thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1219:16a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi //
T02D1219:16a-18: rin chen dag gi dbu rgyan dang /
T02D1219:16a-19: dar dpyang dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
T02D1219:16a-20: aom badzra pa ra ta ka badzr'a ra li ho zhes brjod de sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1219:16a-21: de nas rdo rje mdun du bzhag la /
T02D1219:16a-22: de nyid mi dmigs pa las /
T02D1219:16a-23: dzr'im las padmar gyur pa las snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed la /
T02D1219:16a-24: de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i rdo rje
T02D1219:16a-25: slob ma'i snying gar bzhag la 'di skad brjod do
T02D1219:16a-26: // 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //

T02D1219:16a-28: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi dbang mchog ste //
T02D1219:16a-29: de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya'o //

T02D1219:16a-31: aa bhi shinytsa tishtha b'i ra sa ma ya stvam
T02D1219:16a-32: zhes te / thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1219:16a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1219:16a-34: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1219:16a-35: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / ces brjod la lag pa g-yas par sbyin no //
T02D1219:16a-37: de nas dril bu mdun du bzhag la //
T02D1219:16a-38: de nyid mi dmigs pa las kham dang /
T02D1219:16a-40: don yod grub pa rnams las byung ba'i dril bu
T02D1219:16a-41: lag pa g-yon par sbyin zhing 'di skad brjod do
T02D1219:16a-43: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D1219:16a-44: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1219:16a-45: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D1219:16a-46: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas //
T02D1219:16a-47: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1219:16a-48: srid pa dam pa byed par 'gyur //
T02D1219:16a-49: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhe pa ti stvam
T02D1219:16a-50: aa bhi shinytsa tishtha b'i ra sa ma ya stvam
T02D1219:16a-51: zhes brjod la / lag pa g-yon par dril bu sbyin no //
T02D1219:16a-53: de ltar rdo rje dang dril bu//

T02D1219:16b-2: de la sngags kyis dbang bskur la //
T02D1219:16b-4: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti stvam
T02D1219:16b-5: aa bhi shinytsa mi shr'i he ru ka n'a ma
T02D1219:16b-6: aa bhi she ka ta stvam zhes brjod la /
T02D1219:16b-7: dpal gyi sgra dang bcas pa padma'i mthar thugs pas ming gis dbang bskur ro //
T02D1219:16b-8: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1219:16b-9: he ru ka dpal phyag na bsnams //

T02D1219:16b-16: ha ha ha ha ho: zhes brjod la /

T02D1219:16b-18: aa las bhanbhar gyur par bsgoms te /
T02D1219:16b-19: aom las gri gug du gyur par bsgoms la /

T02D1219:16b-35: gsang ba la sogs pa de rnams la thogs pa med par bsgrub par byos shig ces pa dang /

T02D1219:16b-39: dngos grub thams cad ci dga' bar sgrub par gyis

T02D1219:16b-41: sbyin pa'o // me tog la sogs pa nas gri
T02D1219:16b-42: gug dang thod pa'i dbang bskur ba yan chad kyis
T02D1219:16b-43: ni lus dag par byed pa yin pas na sku'i
T02D1219:16b-44: sbyin pa'o // dbang zhes bya'o // 'bras bu ni gang dang skal ba mnyam pa yin zhe na /
T02D1219:16b-45: sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang skal pa mnyam pa yin no //
T02D1219:16b-46: de nas me tog la sogs pa'i dbang rnams thob pa la bla mas dbang bskur ba bsgrub ste /
T02D1219:16b-47: gnas de nyid du mi med cing dben par byas nas /
T02D1219:16b-48: yol bas bar du bcad de /
T02D1219:16b-49: mandala gru bzhi pa byas la /
T02D1219:17a-0: de dri zhim po dang bdud rtsi lnga'i chag chag @17a * //
T02D1219:17a-2: der me tog chal mar bkram ste /
T02D1219:17a-3: gdan sna tshogs bzang po bting nas /
T02D1219:17a-4: slob mas shes rab ma mtshan dang ldan pa bla ma la phul la /
T02D1219:17a-5: 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1219:17a-6: khyod ni he ru ka dpal te //
T02D1219:17a-7: bde gshegs rnams kyi bde spel mdzad //
T02D1219:17a-8: byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi //
T02D1219:17a-9: yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa //
T02D1219:17a-10: ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yis //
T02D1219:17a-11: mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin //
T02D1219:17a-12: de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi //
T02D1219:17a-13: sdug bsngal rnams ni sel bar mdzod //
T02D1219:17a-14: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri mchog gis //
T02D1219:17a-15: ma rig nyes pa'i rab rib 'joms //
T02D1219:17a-16: gang phyir byang chub bla na med //
T02D1219:17a-17: de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod //
T02D1219:17a-18: ces brjod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1219:17a-19: de nas bla mas shes rab ma bdag med mar bskyed la /
T02D1219:17a-20: de la cho ga bya ba dang /
T02D1219:17a-21: gnas gsum du yang lha gsum bskyed la /
T02D1219:17a-22: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02D1219:17a-25: rjes su dgyes par bya ste bstims la /
T02D1219:17a-26: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan te mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa 'di skad do //
T02D1219:17a-27: aom padma su kha dha ra ma h'a r'a ga
T02D1219:17a-28: su kham datta tsa tu ra a'a nanda bha ga
T02D1219:17a-29: bi shva h'u% h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru sha me
T02D1219:17a-30: / aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tu ra
T02D1219:17a-31: a'a nanda da ya ka kha ga mu kha ae
T02D1219:17a-32: ka r'a so n'a tha h'u% h'u% h'u% ka ryam
T02D1219:17a-33: ku ru shva me zhes brjod pas nyes pa med
T02D1219:17a-34: par rnam par dag par bsam mo //
T02D1219:17a-35: de nas snyoms par zhugs pa bya ste /
T02D1219:17a-36: bskyod pa mdzad cing rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i
T02D1219:17a-37: thugs ka'i mtshan ma'i lte ba'i h'um las 'od 'phros
T02D1219:17a-38: pas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal
T02D1219:17a-39: 'byor ma rnams spyan drangs nas thugs kar thim pa
T02D1219:17a-41: byang chub kyi sems nor bu'i ske ru phyin pa dang /
T02D1219:17a-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1219:17a-43: na badzra sva bha ba a'a tma ko& ham zhes
T02D1219:17a-44: brjod la rjes su chags pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D1219:17a-45: nga yin no bar nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1219:17a-46: de nas byang chub kyi sems bo la'i kha sker
T02D1219:17a-47: mtheb srin gyis mnan la slob ma'i khar drang bar
T02D1219:17a-48: bya'o // de nas slob dpon gyis nye bar longs spyod la /
T02D1219:17a-49: bde bar gnos shig ces bsgo'o //
T02D1219:17a-50: des ae ma re bde zhes brjod de /
T02D1219:17a-51: dbang bskur nas 'thungs pa'i rjes la //
T02D1219:17b-0: bde ba chen po @17b dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid ni bdag ces bla mas brjod do //
T02D1219:17b-1: de ni rdo rje dpal gyis reg pa des ni
T02D1219:17b-2: ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i nyes pa dag par
T02D1219:17b-3: byed pas gsung gi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D1219:17b-4: des 'bras bu gang dang gang skal pa mnyam par 'gyur na /
T02D1219:17b-5: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang skal pa mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1219:17b-6: sa bcu dang skal pa mnyam pa de la lung bstan par bya ste /
T02D1219:17b-7: bla mas chos gos gyon te lag pa g-yas pas chos gos kyi mthar ma bzung la /
T02D1219:17b-9: 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te //
T02D1219:17b-10: he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1219:17b-11: dngos po mchog tu sgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1219:17b-12: srid pa ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02D1219:17b-13: shr'i:he ru ka na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhu ra bhu ba sva:/
T02D1219:17b-14: zhes brjod de don yod grub pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa dang /
T02D1219:17b-15: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu lung ston par mdzad do //
T02D1219:17b-18: // / khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur cing //
T02D1219:17b-19: rgyal ba rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1219:17b-20: phyin ci log gi bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02D1219:17b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer dam par 'jug cing /
T02D1219:17b-22: 'di nyid las sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur gyis ;
T02D1219:17b-23: the tshom dang yid gnyis la sogs pa ma byed
T02D1219:17b-24: cig / gzhan yang bla ma dam pas dbang bskur
T02D1219:17b-25: ba tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa ltar slob ma
T02D1219:17b-28: de nas shes rab ma dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1219:17b-30: shes rab kyi dbang dang ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1219:17b-31: de la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni gzhung
T02D1219:17b-32: dang mthun par mi'i bu mo lo grangs gong ma
T02D1219:17b-33: dang mthun pa bla ma la phul la /
T02D1219:17b-34: mandala dang chag chag la sogs pa gong ma dang mthun par bya'o //
T02D1219:17b-35: de nas bla mas shes rab ma byin gyis brlab pa gong ma dang mthun par byas la /
T02D1219:17b-36: bla mas shes rab ma dang slob ma la bka' bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D1219:17b-37: khyod kyis 'dod chags spang du mi rung gi /
T02D1219:17b-38: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang
T02D1219:17b-39: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rol pa
T02D1219:17b-40: mdzad pa las ye shes cher skyes te /
T02D1219:18a-0: @18a * // mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin pas khyod kyis kyang 'dod chags spang du mi rung ste /
T02D1219:18a-1: gnyis su med pa'i rol par byos shig / ye
T02D1219:18a-2: shes skye bar 'gyur gyis zhes brjod de bsgo bar
T02D1219:18a-3: bya'o // bla mas kyang 'di skad brjod du gzhug go //
T02D1219:18a-4: khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can //
T02D1219:18a-5: dri chen dri chu'i bza' btung dang //
T02D1219:18a-6: rakta ga pur m'am sa dang //
T02D1219:18a-7: bud med mos pas dad nus sam //
T02D1219:18a-8: bha gar 'o byed mi rtog gam /
T02D1219:18a-9: smros shig rdo rje bde ba can //
T02D1219:18a-11: shes rab ma la nus pa'i tshig 'di skad brjod du gzhug go //
T02D1219:18a-12: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi theg / dri chen sa bon sogs za zhing //
T02D1219:18a-13: shes rab yang dag dad par bgyid //
T02D1219:18a-14: bha ga la yang 'o byed do //
T02D1219:18a-15: shes rab ma gcer bur phyung la khrus byas nas
T02D1219:18a-16: dri zhim pos byugs te me tog gi phreng ba
T02D1219:18a-17: mgo la bcings la lag pa gnyis kyis grva gnyis
T02D1219:18a-18: nas bzung ste kha phye la /
T02D1219:18a-19: shes rab mas 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1219:18a-21: thams cad bde ba yang dag ldan //
T02D1219:18a-22: rtag tu rim bzhin 'di la spyod //
T02D1219:18a-24: chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag / sems can khams ni rnam par grol //
T02D1219:18a-26: rang bzhin thams cad 'di la gnas //
T02D1219:18a-27: nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02D1219:18a-28: padma la zhugs rab tu gsungs //
T02D1219:18a-29: bha ga'i nang du nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1219:18a-31: lte ba la ni ge sar bcas //
T02D1219:18a-32: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1219:18a-33: de yi dbus nas 'byung ba yin //
T02D1219:18a-34: de nyid bdud rtsi shu kra'i gzugs //
T02D1219:18a-36: zhes shes rab mas brjod do //
T02D1219:18a-37: de nas bla mas slob ma'i lag pa dang /
T02D1219:18a-38: shes rab ma'i lag pa gnyis steng 'og tu bzhag la /
T02D1219:18a-39: shes rab ma 'dis khyod kyi ye shes skyed par byed pa yin pas /
T02D1219:18a-40: 'di dang khyod dus rtag tu mi 'bral bar 'grogs
T02D1219:18a-41: shig / ces brjod la gtad pa de nyid ni
T02D1219:18a-42: shes rab kyi dbang yin no //
T02D1219:18a-43: de nas slob mas yol ba'i nang du shes rab ma dang gnyis 'dug la /
T02D1219:18a-44: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang nod par bya'o //
T02D1219:18a-45: de nas shes rab ma de la /
T02D1219:18a-46: slob mas glo g-yon pa sa la phab ste nyal la dga' ba'i gtam bya /
T02D1219:18b-0: gnas dgu ru sen mos gdab @18b par bya ba dang /
T02D1219:18b-1: g-yon pa'i lag pa g-yon pa'i glo ru 'dug pas padma'i nang gi rtsa bya'i mgo 'dra ba la /
T02D1219:18b-2: glang po che'i mdzub mo'i lag pas brud pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1219:18b-3: de nas lces kyang rol mo yang dang yang du byas pas padma rgyas su bcug la /
T02D1219:18b-4: de nas shes rab ma dang gnyis sbyor ba bya ste /
T02D1219:18b-5: dal nas dal nas bskyod pa las /
T02D1219:18b-6: byang chub kyi sems po la'i sker phyin pa las
T02D1219:18b-7: mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye bas ji ltar gnas
T02D1219:18b-9: des ma thub na ka kko lar phyung ba de
T02D1219:18b-10: nyid rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin pas lces blang ngo
T02D1219:18b-12: lag pas blang bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1219:18b-13: nya phyis kyis kyang mi blang ste //
T02D1219:18b-14: dung la'ang gzhag par mi bya'o //
T02D1219:18b-15: bdud rtsi lce yis blang bar bya //
T02D1219:18b-17: kakko la nas lce kho nas blang bar bya'o //
T02D1219:18b-18: de nas shes rab ma'i kakko la nas ye shes
T02D1219:18b-19: kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems blangs te zos
T02D1219:18b-20: pas na shes rab ye shes kyi dbang zhes bya'o
T02D1219:18b-21: // de la dga' ba rnam pa bzhi ni /
T02D1219:18b-23: yang dag pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1219:18b-24: rang bzhin gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1219:18b-25: khyad par gyi dga' ba dang bzhi'o //
T02D1219:18b-26: de la dga' ba ni bi tsa ya na bya ba nas bo la'i rtsar phyin pa'i bar ro //
T02D1219:18b-27: yang dag pa'i dga' ba ni dkyil du phyin pa tsam mo //
T02D1219:18b-28: rang bzhin gyi dga' ba ni bo la'i sker phyin pa la bya ste /
T02D1219:18b-29: de ni mi rtog pa skye bar byed pa'o //
T02D1219:18b-30: 'o na der gar rtogs pa yin zhe na /
T02D1219:18b-31: smras pa 'khor lo bzhi'i rang bzhin dang mnyam par bya bar ro //
T02D1219:18b-32: 'o na chad pa dga' ba'i grangs su mi 'gro na /
T02D1219:18b-33: dga' ba ni gsum las med pas 'khor lo bzhi dang /
T02D1219:18b-34: dga' ba bzhi ji ltar sbyar zhe na /
T02D1219:18b-36: chad pa yang dga' ba'i grangs su 'gro ste /
T02D1219:18b-37: gang gi phyir dga' ba chen po med kyang skad
T02D1219:18b-38: cig ma'i dga' ba'i grangs tsam yod pas kyang mi
T02D1219:18b-39: 'gal lo // rgyud las kyang dga' ba bzhi char
T02D1219:18b-40: bstan pas 'khor lo bzhi dang sbyar ba mi 'grol
T02D1219:18b-41: lo zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1219:18b-42: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02D1219:18b-43: des ni yid kyi nyes pa thams cad dag par byed pas thugs kyi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D1219:18b-44: des 'bras bu gang dang skal pa mnyam par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1219:19a-1: bu'i dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1219:19a-2: de nas de'i dam tshig rnams dpog par bya'o //
T02D1219:19a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1219:19a-4: de ni gzhan las shes par bya bas 'dir ma bkod do //
T02D1219:19a-7: nor bu rin po che dang /
T02D1219:19a-13: shing rta nor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1219:19a-14: yid la gces pa'i nor gyi mchog rnams blangs nas /
T02D1219:19a-15: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1219:19a-16: deng nas brtsams te bla ma'i bran du bdag mchi ste /
T02D1219:19a-17: bdag gi lus kyang bzhes su gsol //
T02D1219:19a-19: slob dpon gyis kyang rang gi slob ma byang chub bsgrub pa la dga' ba'i phyir /
T02D1219:19a-20: mos pa dang 'byor ba'i tshogs che zhes legs pa'i tshig sbyin no //
T02D1219:19a-21: mos pa che ba'i slob ma yis //
T02D1219:19a-22: dang por yon ni dbul bar bya //
T02D1219:19a-23: dad mos med pa'i slob ma yis //
T02D1219:19a-24: dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1219:19a-25: slob dpon gyi yon dbul ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1219:19a-26: de nas dkyil 'khor la glu dang gar la sogs pa dang /
T02D1219:19a-27: rol mo'i cha byad mang po thogs la /
T02D1219:19a-28: bskor ba lan gsum dang phyag bya /
T02D1219:19a-29: phyogs skyong la gtor ma btang ste smon lam gyi tshig brjod do //
T02D1219:19a-30: de nas tshon la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i dngos
T02D1219:19a-31: po rnams nang par tho rangs langs la bsdu bar
T02D1219:19a-32: bya'o // bsdus nas gser gyi bum par blugs la chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02D1219:19a-33: bum pa thams cad kyang bsdus la chu bo chen
T02D1219:19a-34: por khyer te bkrus la sngon bzhin du tshogs kyi
T02D1219:19a-36: glu dang gar gyi rnam pa brjod //
T02D1219:19a-37: de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D1219:19a-40: ba yi lci ba rnams sbyar bas sa la byugs par byas la /
T02D1219:19a-41: tshon dang thig mi mngon par bya'o //
T02D1219:19a-42: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las
T02D1219:19a-43: kyi rim pa'i cho ga rgyas pa slob dpon padma
